```{r setup and imports echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(foreign)?ggplot2

```

```{r importing data}
hedon <- read.dta("course_files/hedon.dta")

hed_hist <- hist(hedon$hed)
```


```{r first model}

ols1 <- lm(hed ~ age, data = hedon)
predscore <- predict(ols1)

uniquedata <- cbind(age = hedon$age, predscore = predscore)
uniquedata <- unique(uniquedata)

hedon$agecen <- scale(hedon$age, scale = FALSE)

estd <- rstandard(ols1)

```

```{r single categorical predictor}

ols2 <- lm(hed ~ female, data = hedon)

```


```{r}

ols4 <- lm(hed ~ country, data = hedon)
ols5 <- lm(hed ~ country + age, data = hedon)

```
